programme.title: Transsiberian
programme.desc: One of those legendary train trips that people used to dream about taking, the Transsiberian Express has probably seen better days. An American couple, Roy (Woody Harrelson) and Jessie (Emily Mortimer), decide to return home the long way from their recent sojourn in Peking and meet another couple from the West, Carlos (Eduardo Noriega) and Abby (Kate Mara), with whom they quickly form that tenuous bond that often unites fellow travelers away from home. When Roy gets separated from the train at a stopover, Jessie begins to realize that their compatriots aren't exactly who or what they seem to be. But the real dangers of their unforgettable trip have only begun to surface Russian cops (Ben Kingsley plays one), mobsters, and locals are still to come.

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Academy-Award®-winner Robert De Niro and Academy-Award®-nominee Edward Norton deliver powerful performances as a seasoned corrections official and a scheming inmate whose lives become dangerously intertwined in this thought-provoking drama.

programme.title: In Hell
programme.desc: Kyle LeBlanc (Jean-Claude Van Damme) is an honorable citizen who winds up incarcerated in Russia after he takes revenge on the man who murdered his wife, resulting in the killer's death. Unfortunately for Kyle, he is assigned to a prison that is renowned for its violence. Controlled by a corrupt and sadistic warden, the facility regularly holds brutal fights between inmates. In order to survive in the prison, Kyle must participate in the battles, even as he attempts to retain his humanity.`

programme.title: Faces in the Crowd
programme.desc: Anna (Milla Jovovich) may be the only survivor of serial killer Tearjerk Jack's horrendous reign, but left with “face blindness,” she is completely unable to identify him – or anyone else. Now, with only a loyal detective's (Julian McMahon) face familiar to her, she cannot trust anyone as she struggles to resume her normal life, and, plagued by fear and a vindictive Jack, struggles to survive.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - "Terry Loves 70's Cop Shows"

We bounce around in this one going from taking the kids to school, handling business at the office, showing an amazing property, and finally getting some time to hunt. programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares - Hot Potato Cafe
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to Philadelphia, Pennsylvania to visit Hot Potato Cafe. He finds an owner sapped of passion who has created a toxic environment filled with negativity.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares - Le Bistro

programme.title: Fruit, Aguas, Ices & Paletas: The Ripe Stuff

programme.title: Iron Chef - Prawn
programme.desc: Chen must face a man who was his father's trusted apprentice. When they both prepare his father's signature dish, who will win?

programme.title: The Chefs' Line - Lebanese
programme.desc: Maeve O'Meara visits the kitchen of Nour. Maeve and the chefs' line reminisce about the week and delve into delicious new dishes, including a duck shawarma and camel sambusak, bombalaska, and a modern fatteh.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line - Thai
programme.desc: Apprentice chef Peppi from Thai restaurant Easy Tiger goes up against four passionate home cooks. Witness the competition, camaraderie, and spectacular skills of these talented cooks and chefs. Who will make it to the end of the chefs' line?

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares - Return to Amy's Baking Company
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to Scottsdale to visit Amy's Baking Company. We see an interview with the owners, previously unseen footage and initial reactions to Gordon's first visit.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares - Greek at the Harbor
programme.desc: Greek at the Harbor is on the verge of closing. It's up to Chef Ramsay to save the waterfront venue by improving the menu, the dated décor and the relationship between its owners.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen - Stars Heating Up Hell
programme.desc: The chefs must instruct some famous athletes to make their signature dishes using only verbal instructions. The contestants cook in one kitchen during dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen - Families Come to Hell
programme.desc: Families of the four remaining chefs visit. The chefs must base a dish on a secret ingredient hidden in a gift chosen by them.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: All The Pizza

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: Venturing out with local Newquay fisherman Phil, Luke helps catch spiny spider crabs and cooks up Asian-inspired crab cakes. Then, Luke meets Cornwall's "best" pasty maker, before discovering what it takes to produce caviar that's fit for the Queen.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: In Cardiff, Luke meets an artisan bread maker who delivers bread to homes by bicycle. Next, Luke heads to the seaside and stumbles across the Hang Fire Smokehouse pop-up restaurant. Then, he travels to Wentwood Reservoir for a spot of fly fishing.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: In the hills of the Lake District, Luke cooks with a cut of the delicious local sheep. He meets Annette Gibbons, whose passion for Cumbrian food earned her an Order of the British Empire. Later, Luke is taught the secrets of Haaf net fishing.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: Between the waters of Bute and the mainland, Luke chases succulent langoustines and meets a seaweed who is making the most of the island's natural resources. Later, he visits Mount Stuart and creates a Scottish whiskey dessert.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, Luke discovers the country's traditional cuisine and checks out the Scots Monument and Edinburgh Castle. He learns how to make the Scottish delicacy, haggis and is entertained by the Duchess of Northumberland in her poisonous garden.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: Luke discovers a chef's paradise at Vallum Farm, where he cooks a mouth-watering pork belly. Then, he visits the historic Hadrian's Wall and prepares a meal fit for a Roman emperor. Later, Luke explores Manchester's busy restaurant strip, Curry Mile.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's United Kingdom
programme.desc: Luke reflects on his travels and discoveries before catching up with friend Brett Graham, co-owner of Michelin-starred The Ledbury. Later, Luke meets Viking Ole who shares his secrets to smoking the perfect salmon.

programme.desc: Bridget and Julia teach viewers how to make the ultimate Beef Tenderloin with Smoky Potatoes and Persillade Relish. Tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a turkey tasting. Gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews fat separators, and then test cook Dan Souza makes Turkey Breast en Cocotte with Pan Gravy.

programme.title: Roast Beef and Potatoes
programme.desc: Test cook Natalie Estrada reveals the secrets to making a foolproof Classic Roast Beef Tenderloin with host Bridget Lancaster. Next, host Julia Collin Davison discovers equipment expert Adam Ried's top pick of tongs. Finally, test cook Lawman Johnson shows Julia how to make perfect Lyonnaise Potatoes.

programme.title: Regional Italian-American Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a New York classic, Prosciutto Bread. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of provolone cheese. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Bridget how to make the easiest-ever Drop Meatballs.

programme.title: Italian Comfort Food Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof cooks host Julia Collin Davison a surprising Italian classic: Chicago Thin-Crust Pizza with Homemade Italian Sausage. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a live taste test of jarred pasta sauce. Finally, test cook Lawman Johnson and host Bridget reveal the secrets to a perfect Pasta Fagioli.

programme.title: Arroz con Pollo and Sour Orange Pie
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison prepare a comfort food classic: Arroz con Pollo. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of store-bought whipped topping. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison reveals the steps to make a Florida favorite, Sour Orange Pie.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare a show-stopping special occasion Cider-Braised Pork Roast. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a sauerkraut tasting. Finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison the secrets to tackling authentic Pittsburgh-style Potato-Cheddar Pierogi at home.

programme.title: Regional Italian-American Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a New York classic, Prosciutto Bread. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of provolone cheese. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Bridget how to make the easiest-ever Drop Meatballs.

programme.title: Fish Tacos and Steak Fajitas
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof and host Bridget Lancaster prepare a Southern California classic, Smoked Fish Tacos. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top pick of chimney starters. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia Grilled Steak Fajitas.

programme.title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison unveils the secrets to the ultimate Barbecue Chicken Thighs to host, Bridget Lancaster. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of popcorn. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof demonstrates how to make Fried Peach Pies at home.

programme.title: Ballpark Classics
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison grill up Sausage and Peppers. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of whole-wheat sandwich bread. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews disposable plates. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia the best Ballpark Pretzels.

programme.title: Reimagining Italian American Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a regional favorite-Detroit-Style Pizza. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews rasp-style graters. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore makes host Bridget Lancaster an updated version of a classic dish, Fettuccine with Butter and Cheese.

programme.title: Italian Chicken
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster go into the test kitchen together to uncover the secrets to Better Chicken Marsala. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews Manual Citrus Juicers in the Equipment Corner. Finally, test cook Erin McMurrer shows Bridget how to make the ultimate Skillet-Roasted Chicken in Lemon Sauce at home.

programme.title: Elegant Fall Dinner
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make the best Tuscan-Style Roast Pork with Garlic and Rosemary. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews wine accessories in the Equipment Corner. Then, test cook Becky Hays reveals the secrets to making the perfect Farro Salad with Asparagus, Sugar Snap Peas, and Tomatoes.

programme.title: Pub-Style Favorites, Revisited
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Pub-Style Steak and Ale Pie at home. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for knife blocks. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser makes Bridget perfect Boston Brown Bread.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Dinner Duet
programme.desc: Some foods are sexy because of their texture or flavor, and some are sexy because of how they're served. These are the foods we'd cook for a very important evening. A lush seafood stew with scallops, shrimp, mussels, clams and Pernod, a whole-leaf Caesar salad made to be eaten with your fingers, and a silken Caramel Panna Cotta. We'll visit Greystone, one of the oldest buildings in the valley.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Late Night Dining
programme.desc: We take you along to the biggest charity event in the Napa Valley and then come back home to make some late-night favorites: a home-style onion soup, a spicy spaghetti Amatriciana, and dried-fruit compote flavored with Sambuca.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Winter Favorites
programme.desc: When the temperature drops, foods should deepen in flavor. These are the dishes we make when it's cold outside. A Chicken Bolognaise that's lower in fat than the traditional version, Fennel Roasted Vegetables, and a cheesecake made with flavorful mascarpone.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Pesto Perfecto
programme.desc: Pesto is much more than basil and pine nuts. Learn the technique and make tomato pesto (with our infamous flowerpot chicken and bruschetta), walnut pesto and even your own pesto with the flavors you choose. Meet some olive growers who make olive oil in the Napa Valley.

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Panzanella
programme.desc: Italians make this bread and vegetable salad in the summer with fresh tomatoes and garlic. We show how to make it all year long, with a springtime asparagus panzanella, a classic summer version, and with veal medallions to serve as a main course. We'll tour Main Street, St. Helena, and see some of the valley's most charming stores and restaurants.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Hill Country Venison: Chef David Bull, Austin, TX.
programme.desc: Hill Country Venison: Chef David Bull, Austin, TX. In Austin, Texas, there is a man named Bull who, contrary to his name, is no cowpoke----instead it's deer that strikes his fancy, and fine dining is his game. The chef and his sons get a close look at the Cervidae as they frolic through Texas' Hill Country.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Winter Bay Scallops: Chef Michel Nischan, Westport, CT.
programme.desc: Winter Bay Scallops: Chef Michel Nischan, Westport, CT. In this episode the chef plunges in for one of nature's perfect offerings,: the bay scallop, with its pink and orange shell and translucent, sweet meat. Breaking the ice, we pull up the sought after delicacy,: in-shell scallops that taste of green apples and the sea.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Ice Cream From A Cow: Chef Bill Telepan, New York
programme.desc: Ice Cream From A Cow: Chef Bill Telepan, New York. The chef and daughter head out on a milking adventure in upstate New York to a dairy farm that is: "hopelessly out of date, and proud of it," says the dairyman. Here they milk and make milk products the same way they did it three generations ago, in small batches, delivered at peak freshness, pasteurized and hormone-free.

programme.title: Chefs A'Field: Kids On The Farm - Wild Foraging: Chef Jason Wilson, Seattle
programme.desc: Wild Foraging: Chef Jason Wilson, Seattle. In true Seattle style, the chef straps on his boots to trek deep into the woods around of the Puget Sound in search of wild mushrooms maple blossoms, stinging nettles, fiddlehead ferns, fragrant truffles, berries and a menagerie of exotic herbs, berries, and fungi mushrooms offerings from the wild.

programme.title: Cooking with Nick Stellino - Breakfast Favorites

programme.title: Getting Amongst
programme.desc: Shane and Ben explore the Netherlands by bike and discover an old church that was converted into a skatepark. They arrive in The Hague in time for “Go Skate Day”, where they meet Tessa who takes them kitesurfing.

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: Heading up the coast on Highway 1, Curtis visits with a couple who turned from tech to cheesemaking and savors sea urchin with the only female uni diver in California.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: A visit to Western Australia finds Curtis in the quintessential Outback where he is educated by an Aboriginal elder on ancient fishing methods and herds cattle with a fifth-generation female rancher.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip
programme.desc: A trip to Umbria finds Curtis chasing canine companions for black truffles and getting a tutorial from a master of porchetta.

programme.title: Curtis Stone's Field Trip

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E234
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is risking city-pop songwriter nokdu! nokdu made his big debut in 2018 with the single "Say My Name." As a graduate of The Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts, founded by Paul McCartney and Mark Featherstone-Witty, he covers a wide range of genres in his music, ranging from Brit-pop to punk to R&B. Backed up by his academic background, he boasts his outstanding ability not only as a songwriter but also a lyricist, producer, and singer. Also known for his stage manners, he is quickly capturing the ears and souls of countless listeners. Currently, he's taking part in the competition program "Super Band 2." His fantastic performance in the show definitely makes us anticipate his future as a musician. In this episode, nokdu performs "Stay With Me," "Wona," and more to show off the essence of his artistry. Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet this talented artist!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Greg Warren - Fish Sandwich
programme.desc: Greg Warren is a nationally touring headliner and has been featured on Late Night with Seth Meyers, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central Presents, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, BET and CMT. Greg is a fan favorite on the nationally syndicated Bob and Tom Radio Show and can be heard daily on Sirius/XM.

programme.title: Danny Johnson - The Chusky Life
programme.desc: Danny Johnson's hilarious, clean stand-up has entertained audiences in comedy clubs, corporate events, and churches nationwide. Often called a cross between Jerry Seinfeld and Kevin James Danny's show is relatable, engaging, and always hilarious. Danny has starred in numerous TV commercials, Comedy Central's Laugh Riots, Florida's Funniest Comedian semi-finalist, Winner-Carnival Cruise line Comedy Challenge, Finalist in Search for the One Christian Comedy contest, and has had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Chris Rock, Bob Saget, Billy Gardell, Richard Lewis, and a variety of others. Danny has led a dual track career for over a decade achieving success in both corporate America and as a comedian. Blending his unique skill sets led to him publishing his first book, "You Stink and They Know It! A practical guide to nailing your next job interview."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Kevin Bozeman - Clean and Unfiltered
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I'm wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central's “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC's “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus - A Mild and Skinny Guy
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Jeff Big Daddy Wayne - Big Daddy Kicks It
programme.desc: Comedian Jeff Wayne was dubbed “Big Daddy” by Billy Crystal and Robin Williams on an HBO Comic Relief show. The moniker has stuck to a guy who's been part of the stand-up comedy scene for a long time. He's toured all over the world, several times in Europe. The Norwegian Newspaper “Sondags B.A.”, described him as having “amazing audience communication, and ferociously funny!”

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That's where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Jamie Lissow - Something Awesome
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central's Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he's also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Eric Lyden: Any Chance You Didn't Shove That Job Yet?
programme.desc: According to Eric Lyden, all it takes to be a comedian is not being able to do anything else. Regardless, having alternative uses for cork screws, shove-it speeches, and white noise machines can't hurt.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Bill Boronkay - You Can Do Better

programme.desc: This animated series centers on house cat Fred, a dreamer of the great outdoors. The series is voiced by comic actors, including "Saturday Night Live" alums Taran Killam (Nature Cat), Kate McKinnon (Squeeks), Bobby Moynihan (Hal) and Kenan Thompson (Ronald). programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. “Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure” says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as “general manager” of “castle operations,” much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm – AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge “Gold is Good” ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything…including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live…poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents – Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond –think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a “spa holiday” with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into…Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says “No deal.” “We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents.” It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship ‘The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become ‘The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession - Episode 203
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the “Minitrex” – a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for “Best Costume.” The prize: “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1.” The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just…about…to get the book when…the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! “Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1” is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy…she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective - Episode 13
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show – in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day – Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty – the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament - Episode 204
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille - Episode 14
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls – until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong – especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing (“Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?”), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then…more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort “Exalted Towers” renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the “high class” resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are “off” at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see…Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters – though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends – until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster. Tired of intense training, Lloyd yearns to play and enjoy his youth. The Ninja remind Lloyd that along with great power, comes great responsibility. When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and soon discover they've been turned into kids! Seeking Lloyd's help and relying on childhood antics, the five ninja kids must destroy the reawakened monster that's hunting them in the city. In the end, Lloyd makes the difficult decision and sacrifices his youth in order to save them from the beast, turning forward the clock and turning Lloyd into a young man. Sensei Wu fears now that since Lloyd is young man, the final battle of good versus evil approaches sooner than he had ever expected.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever - Episode 207
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of “snotty” monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham – one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a “snotheiser” ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters … some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath…he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two…it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power “Glorious Griffon” but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: I Told You So - Episode 17
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight - Episode 208
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way - Episode 18
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious - Episode 209
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Gummibar & Friends - The Gummy Bear Show
programme.desc: Gummy lives in an apartment with his friend Harry the Chameleon, while his other friend Kala the Cat hangs out in a ninja dojo on the roof. Together they go on wild and wacky adventures in their building and hometown. Enjoy the fun and crazy adventures...

programme.title: One Stormy Night
programme.desc: We follow the journeys and explorations of May, a spirited young goat, and Gabu, a wolf who is also May's courageous best friend. Each episode tells how May and Gabu try to have adventurous fun, while hiding their companionship from their respective tribes at the same time.

programme.title: Talking Tom And Friends Season 3

programme.title: Counting With Paula: Let's Build a Robot
programme.desc: Paula and friends are building their very own toy robot using robot parts. After assembling the parts together, they count and realize their creation is missing an arm. The robot is incomplete!

programme.title: Counting With Paula: The Sky Cup
programme.desc: The Blue Baron invites Paula and friends to participate in the Sky Cup, a flying race to find out who is the fastest in the sky. The competition is fierce with the Blue Baron, and Paula and friends go

programme.title: Counting With Paula: Pastries and Flowers
programme.desc: Paula does not have enough vases to keep her fresh sunflowers.

programme.title: Counting With Paula: Baby Monkey Spells
programme.desc: A heavy thunderstorm has caused a flood in the jungle.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders: Rainbow Colors / Garbage Truck / Halloween / Sandcastle
programme.desc: Welcome to Blippi's new animated adventure series, Blippi Wonders! Have you ever wondered how a rainbow gets its colors? Join Blippi and his sidekick TABBS on their first adventure as they discover

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm: Wheels On The Bus / 5 Little Ducks - Playtime at the Farm! / Wash Your Hands, Scrub That Soap Song / ABC Song - Learn Phonics / Yes Yes Vegetables Song - Healthy Habits!
programme.desc: We are introduced to the magic of Lellobee Farm. Ella arrives to spend the day there, meeting Mei and her best friend Rishi. They then explore Lellobee and meet all the animals living there.

programme.title: Shane the Chef: Hollywood Izzy
programme.desc: Izzy surprises Shane by announcing that she would rather be a filmmaker than a chef. Will Shane get over his disappointment? And what will Izzy's film turn out like?

programme.title: Shane the Chef: Mama Polenta's Date Night
programme.desc: It's Mama Polenta and Alf's wedding anniversary and Shane has offered to cook curry and rice, Alf's favourite! But Mario's pet hamster has chewed his way through the rice. What will Shane do and will

programme.title: The Pirates Next Door: The Crash / Curse of the Cosy Corsairs
programme.desc: Matilda accidentally sets the pirate ship loose and it crashes into the school! / Jim tells everyone that his pirate family has a curse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Pup Tales

programme.title: Dr. Chris Pet Vet
programme.desc: Chris helps a young family choose a very unusual pet – a mini pig. A wrong decision could cause chaos, so Chris needs to make sure that the family is ready for the challenges of owning a little piggie. An orphaned lamb has been adopted by a loving dalmatian. And, meet a dog with a skateboarding obsession.

programme.title: Nigel Marven Cruise Ship Adventures
programme.desc: On this voyage from Athens around the sun-soaked Greek islands and up the Adriatic coast to Italy, Nigel revels in the natural wonders of this ancient world. In Athens itself he reveals how a little owl was the reason for coins with two faces, the origin of heads and tails. On sun-soaked islands the presenter finds leopard snakes under stones and head-bobbing lizards on castle walls. In Santorini he takes the ship's ballroom stars and singers to dance with fishes, and mountain-climbs in Crete to find soaring griffin vultures. And on a beach near Olympia it's a dream come true for the ship's dancers when they help to rescue tiny loggerhead turtle babies and release them into the sea.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff cruises around the globe, seeking out the planet's most awesome adventures! In Australia, Jeff climbs high above Sydney for a sweeping view of its famous harbor. Then, he sails to Japan to explore the world of the Samurai. Jeff's adventure continues in Sri Lanka exploring a mighty waterfall, and in Dominica discovering volcanic activity beneath the Caribbean Sea.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.sub-title: Tigers, Spice, and All Things Nice
programme.desc: Jeff arrives to the historic port of Cochin, India where he experiences the ancient performance art of Kathakali in full costume. Then, he treks through a tiger preserve and discovers India's incredible native wildlife, including the elusive Bengal tiger. Finally, Jeff visits the famous spice market and washes down his adventure with a taste of the region's specialty, masala chai.

programme.title: Rock the Park
programme.desc: Jack and Colton are headed to manatee capitol of the world to snorkel with these docile creatures.

programme.title: Earth: The Nature Of Our Planet
programme.desc: It's the solid crust of our planet, the perfect element in which to record the stories of deep time and of lifetimes. Change and progression is the way of earth. Air and water turn solid rock into soil. Animals walk upon that soil and are supported by it but plants turn soil into life. We learn how they can feed themselves and the whole chain of animal life, in the realm of Land.

programme.title: Tian Shan: Land Of Bears And Horses
programme.desc: Spring is in the Tian Shan, the ‘Mountains of Heaven' in the south of Kazakhstan, in Asia, and two brown bear cubs and their mother have just left their den. For the brothers a journey full of adventures begins, but their mother will teach them how to master life between high summits and vast grasslands. For the first time ever a film team has managed to capture the family life of brown bears in the mountains of Asia. This is a warm-hearted, authentic portrait of a bear family, their neighbours and the beauty of their rugged homeland.

programme.title: The Wildlife
programme.desc: Deepest darkest Africa... Not many know too much about it, and what we have seen on TV doesn't even begin to describe the natural beauty. Welcome to Volunteer Southern Africa, a social programme that's over 10 years old and thas hosted nearly 10,000 volunteers from 25 different countries changing lives while doing so. Here, volunteers get to life the real “bush life” and we track every step of this incredible journey.

programme.title: The Wildlife

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs

Can the team save Puba's tiny teeth? See what it takes to perform an otter root canal! Then, when you think of alligators their big mouth and scaly skin come to mind. But did you know they make some of the best mother's in the wild? Witness the maternal instinct of a mommy alligator.

programme.title: The Wildlife Docs
programme.sub-title: A Really Big Day at BGT
programme.desc: Witness a day in the life at Busch Gardens Tampa. From house calls on the Serengeti Plain to emergencies in the Animal Care Center... training lions, elephants, hippos, and orangutans. The educators are making enrichment items for the gorillas in the education kitchen while The Wildlife Docs diagnose a grey kangaroo who might have pneumonia. When your job is to take care of 12,000 animals, every day is a big day at Bush Gardens Tampa.

programme.title: Dr. Chris Pet Vet

And at SASH, a six-year-old aspiring vet helps Dr. Lisa diagnose her listless puppy named Jelly. Then, Dr. Chris is shocked when a wild Currawong is brought into the clinic with a wooden skewer through its wing. Can Dr. Chris save this bird's life?

programme.title: Dr. Chris Pet Vet
programme.desc: Pluto the singing dalmatian has lost his voice, and Dr. Chris fears that the cause may be sinister. And Tim Faulkner needs to remove a scale that has lodged itself over the eye of one of the reptile park's most dangerous snakes - the King Cobra.

programme.desc: Terry finally gets to compare himself to Brad Pitt!! Terry and Larry test 3 scenes from action film Mr. and Mrs. Smith. Can a refrigerator or elevator door protect our heroes? Also, can you ignite a gas line with just a bullet? Larry may not look as stunning as Angelina Jolie, but he will help Terry find out the answers.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Dropped into a downhill bike park, Tim & Gendle want to create a human ‘marble run', where motorcycle riders are enclosed in zorbs. Tim & Gendle are determined to create carnage.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Tim and Gendle are given just three days and a grand to turn this week's location, a derelict factory, into BMX bike heaven.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will be test 2 scenes from Justified where, Terry, aka Raylan Givins finds himself in a bathtub and a dead body lying over top of him. A woman stands near ready to end his life when Raylan shoots his service revolver through the dead body and into the woman killing her. Terry and Larry will also test to see if they can incapacitate a bad guy by shooting the steering wheel of the car to activate the airbag.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test a scene from Reindeer Games when Ben Affleck and Charlize Theron get trapped under a frozen lake, and they escape by shooting 3 shots with a 12-gauge shot gun underwater to blast a hole in the ice to escape.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau visits an estuary in North Carolina and catches blue crabs, which have adapted to both saltwater and freshwater. Then Philippe goes to Curacao and takes a submersible 500 feet below the surface to look at sea life.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau explores the various ways our planet is always in motion. We'll visit the volcanic Mt. Saint Helens in Washington, where the movement of the earth's crust caused this mountain to erupt and create devastation in 1980.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown | The One Where Lightning Strikes Twice
programme.desc: Mother Nature isn't messing around and she's back with even more of the craziest weather clips assembled. From the shores of Florida, to the outback of Australia, we've traveled the world to collect these videos, and each one is designed to blow you away.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown | Cloudy With a Chance of Hurricanes
programme.desc: MOTHER NATURE UNPREDICTABLE, POWERFUL AND MESMERIZING. ANYTHING CAN CHANGE IN A SPLIT SECOND. FROM HEAVY RAIN, TO HAIL THE SIZE OF BASEBALLS, GIANT TORNADOS, AND WILDFIRES ENCAPSULATING THOUSANDS OF ACRES OF LAND, THIS IS JUST ANOTHER DAY HERE ON EXTREME WEATHER COUNTDOWN.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather | Fire & Water

With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Hercules Reborn

programme.title: Dark Night of the Scarecrow
programme.desc: In a small Southern town, a wrongfully-killed man exacts revenge on those who murdered him from beyond the grave.

programme.title: High Kick Angels
programme.desc: When a gang breaks into a high school, it is up to the school's action film club to stop them!

programme.title: The Jurassic Dead
programme.desc: Soldiers and tech geeks in the desert fight an engineered T-Rex that turns its victims into zombies.

programme.title: Treasure Inn
programme.desc: Two low-ranking constables seek to gain promotions by capturing the murderers who stole a valuable statue.

programme.title: For a Few Bullets
programme.desc: A professional thief & special agent team up to stop the Japanese military from stealing a national treasure.

programme.title: That Touch of Mink
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He's enchanted by her small town ways, she's captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars as Jay Gatsby, who had once loved beautiful, spoiled Daisy Buchanan (Mia Farrow), then lost her to a rich boy. But now Gatsby is mysteriously wealthy...and ready to risk everything to woo Daisy back.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: The Boys Next Door
programme.desc: Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

programme.title: When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: The Summer of Ben Tyler
programme.desc: In the deep South in the 1940s, an up-and-coming young lawyer finds the courage to make a difficult moral decision with the help of his family, especially a young, mentally handicapped black man that they have adopted.

programme.title: Mr. Hockey: The Gordie Howe Story
programme.desc: The story of Gordie Howe's famed return to hockey at age 45, playing professionally alongside his 18- and 19-year-old sons, a comeback that brought his family together and remains one of the most legendary in hockey history.

programme.title: I Do, I Do, I Do
programme.sub-title: I Do, I Do, I Do
programme.desc: An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.

programme.title: A Friend of the Family
programme.desc: Allison was unsettled by David's creepy attentions but she was the only one to suspect him of being a monster.

programme.title: The Deadly Look of Love
programme.desc: A young woman meets the man of her dreams, only to find out that he's about to marry another woman.

programme.title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: Remake of the 1956 film noir film in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt DA takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Border Run
programme.desc: An American reporter searches for her missing brother amid the violence that plagues the US/Mexico border.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A cop is assigned to the neighborhood where he grew up, where an old secret threatens to destroy his family.

programme.title: Sprinter
programme.desc: A Jamaican teen burdened by family troubles hopes his rise in track and field can reunite him with his mother.

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: A socially awkward, home-schooled kid forces his way into public school against his suffocating but loving mother's wishes. Co-starring Judy Greer.

programme.title: The Anatomy of Love
programme.desc: A confused college student expresses her disbelief in the power of love. Through a class assignment, she examines her own values and finds the love she has been looking for right under her nose.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma and other high school obstacles, developing a friendship through their love of dance.

programme.title: Voyage of the Yes
programme.desc: Two teenagers set out on a 2000-mile sailboat journey from California to Hawaii.

programme.title: A Boy Called Dad
programme.desc: When he becomes a father at age 14, Robbie's life quickly spirals out of control. Feeling neglected by his own dad, he enacts a series of events that will catapult him into adulthood.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: Joe Dante directed this satirical action-comedy about talking tech toys accidentally juiced-up with military microchips.

programme.title: The Man In the Iron Mask
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio leads a phenomenal cast in this thrilling tale of majesty and Musketeers. When the excesses of France's arrogant King Louis XIV begin to threaten his subjects' very lives, the legendary Musketeers reunite to save their country!

programme.title: The Phantom
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: Joe Dante directed this satirical action-comedy about talking tech toys accidentally juiced-up with military microchips.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The greatest adventure of all time begins with Star Trek, the incredible story of a young crew's maiden voyage onboard the most advanced starship ever created: the U.S.S. Enterprise.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: When Hunter and McCall investigate the alleged death of a reporter, they uncover an extortion plot involving a wealthy industrialist who has illicit dealings with a construction firm.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall become suspicious when a Bel Air housewife refuses to identify the man who robbed her.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the mysterious death of Allegra, Hunter's former girlfriend, to determine if the beautiful young heiress jumped or was pushed from a skyscraper window.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Detective Doyle comes out of retirement to help Hunter and McCall investigate the real-life murder of actress-turned-prostitute Elizabeth Short, who was cut in half 41 years before.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the mysterious death of a famous movie actress and encounter a surviving sister hungry for the inheritance.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter, investigating the murder of a famous movie actress, follows a contract killer to Mexico and learns why the CIA is interested in the killing.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Devane tries to take Hunter and McCall off the investigation of his ex-wife's murder and violates his forced leave of absence to pursue the killer himself.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall's investigation of the stabbing of a deaf man hinges on cryptic clues the victim gave in sign language before he died.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: The wife of a businessman who was killed in an explosion on his yacht becomes the prime suspect when Hunter and McCall discover that she was recently removed from his will.

programme.title: Cruel and Unusual
programme.desc: Robert King, Herman Wallace and Albert Woodfox spent longer in solitary confinement than any other prisoners in the US after the murder of a prison guard in 1972. They were convicted by bribed witnesses and with no physical evidence. This film examines their struggle against a miscarriage of justice.

programme.title: Finders Keepers
programme.desc: A stranger-than-fiction tale about amputee John Wood who accidentally sold off his mummified limb and his quest to regain custody of his body part from the person that paid to acquire it. But beyond the surface of this tabloid fodder is a story of addiction, redemption, and two strangers with brow-raising synchronicities.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of The Hill
programme.desc: The residents of Rio de Janeiro's largest slum seek justice for a local man they believe has been murdered by the police.

programme.title: Inside Lehman Brothers
programme.desc: Messy mortgages taken out by Lehman Brothers caused a global financial crisis. Ten years later, the French journalist Jennifer Deschamps examines the moral failures of the institution and the insiders and whistleblowers who attempted to make their voices heard.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: The Search
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Family Secrets
programme.desc: 'Family Secrets'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: The Best Thing!
programme.desc: One day, restaurant owner Justin Alexander's life takes a dramatic turn when he finds out from one of his customers that his deceased ex-girlfriend has a son in the child welfare system. This child is around the age of when Justin and his girlfriend split up. Could this boy be Justin's son? Determined to find out if this kid is his, Justin recognizes being united with this child could have frightening consequences. Or it could be The Best Thing!

programme.title: Letters from the Bottle
programme.desc: An accomplished writer finds his way back to his work after experiencing a tragedy.

programme.title: Ebony Hustle
programme.desc: BAM baby! You busted! Ex-stripper turned private investigator, Ebony, takes on her most dangerous case yet.

programme.title: Church Folks 2
programme.desc: Pastor Frank and his team are back with a new worship team, and a new plan to save their ministry. But time is not on their side. The clock is ticking, and every passing hour brings them closer to losing their ministry. With their lender itching to foreclose and a wealthy investor eying their building, the stakes have never been this high. Will they be able to bounce back?

programme.title: Dark Seed
programme.desc: The ticking of her biological clock brings Emon, a hard-driving executive in line for a big promotion, to a decision not shared by her amiable husband Idreese in this intimate drama. A guilty secret buried in her past and an unspoken trauma lurking in his bring on a crisis, as the future of their seemingly perfect marriage hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Dating My Mother
programme.desc: Dating My Mother follows the intimate and tumultuous relationship between a single mother and her gay son as they navigate the dizzying world of online dating.

programme.title: Adventure Boyz
programme.desc: When a notorious crime boss (Jon Campling 'Harry Potter's 'Death eater') and his men steal a hoard of Diamonds from england's Largest Castle, the last thing they expected to be up against, were two boys on BMX and their speedway racer Dad!

programme.title: Adventures in Public School
programme.desc: A socially awkward home-schooled kid forces his way into public-school when he falls for the popular one-legged girl (Siobhan Williams). Much to his mother's (Judy Greer) chagrin, he gets a crash course in sex, drugs, and social mayhem.

programme.title: Chalk It Up
programme.desc: When a super girly-girl is dumped by her boyfriend she decides to do everything she can to get him back by building a college gymnastics team.

programme.title: Thrill Ride

programme.desc: About a nouveau-riche Los Angeles couple who, after 17 years of marriage, decide to call it quits.

programme.desc: This sharp, sparkling comedy stars Claudette Colbert as an extremely bright woman who weds her boss.
